Name: Statuette of Harpocrates
Description: Statuette of Harpocrates (Horus the Child), standing in a walking position, naked, with the left arm alongside the body and the right arm bent, raising the index finger of the right hand to the mouth. His head is shaved and he has the youth lock at his right temple. He is wearing the uraeus on his forehead and the solar disc is on his head.
